context: Government agency implementing national digital identity system for citizen services

request.purpose: National digital identity infrastructure development and citizen enrollment
request.justification: Modernize citizen services, enhance security, reduce identity fraud

decision_process.outcome: Comprehensive requirements document with privacy protections
Blockchain-based solution selected with strong privacy features
